DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess feasibility , acceptability test initial efficacy eSBI , ( electronic screening brief intervention alcohol use ) couple STTR ( Seek , Test , Treat , Retain ) comparison STTR among YMSM ( young men sex men ) YTW ( young transgender woman ) frequency substance use engagement within HIV ( human immunodeficiency virus ) PrEP ( pre-exposure prophylaxis ) care continuum .
DOC.brief_title: Employing eSBI HIV Testing At-risk Youth
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess feasibility , acceptability test initial efficacy eSBI , ( electronic screening brief intervention alcohol use ) couple STTR ( Seek , Test , Treat , Retain ) comparison STTR among YMSM ( young men sex men ) YTW ( young transgender woman ) frequency substance use engagement within HIV PrEP ( pre-exposure prophylaxis ) care continuum . We follow aim : Aim 1 : Assess feasibility , acceptability initial efficacy electronic Screening & Brief Intervention + Seek , Test , Treat Retain ( eSBI+ STTR ) compare STTR-only reduce alcohol substance use among 450 YMSM YTW Chicago , age 16-25 , 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month post-intervention . Aim 2 : To explore initial efficacy eSBI+STTR comparison STTR-only secondary exploratory outcome within HIV PrEP care continuum among YMSM YTW . Aim 3 : Determine degree sub-groups youth differentially impact eSBI+STTR base socio-demographic characteristic co-morbid mental health problem inform future target and/or tailor intervention .
DOC.criteria: age 16 25 year seek test HIV infection Male sex men OR transgender woman sex men ( i.e. , bear male , identify female/transgender , point gender transition process ) Englishspeaking . volunteer seem distraught emotionally unstable ( i.e . suicidal , manic , exhibit violent behavior ) volunteer seem intoxicated influence psychoactive agent
